reviews.review_msg: I never liked Canadian history to begin with, but needed this course to fulfill a requirement. The special topic was Trudeaumania. Chenier's course just reaffirmed my opinion of Cdn. hist. What turned me off was her being self-absorbed, bigoted, and irritable. Only good thing she did was to hire TAs. I would probably fail if she was in tutorials.
Always respectful to students and open minded. Nice guy. Nice job.

Pros: Knowledgeable, open-minded, calm, and a very good facilitator of discussion. Cons: A little on the quieter side, sometimes it is hard to follow what he is saying, and his lecturing style can become boring quickly. In general, however, I found professor Chohan to be a solid instructor.
